thread.title: 'Now and Then' Turns 20 -- See Where the All-Star Cast is Today (PHOTOS)
thread.title_full: 'Now and Then' Turns 20 -- See Where the All-Star Cast is Today (PHOTOS)

title: 'Now and Then' Turns 20 -- See Where the All-Star Cast is Today (PHOTOS)
text:
start slideshow 
Not to make you feel old or anything, but the '90s cult classic Now and Then just turned 20 years old . The coming of age tale included two actresses for each of four friends, who gathered together to reminisce about their friendship as children. 
It's been two decades since we met Samantha, Roberta, Teeny, and Chrissy, and we love them still. Take a look at how all the stars of the film have changed over the last 20 years.
